title: HELP: Game is crashing
body:
About once per day, when I'm in the middle of a game, my computer will freeze and I have to restart it. I'm unable to exit the game, alt tab, or do anything. I just have to do a hard restart. This has been happening for about a month, and will happen regardless of how many or how few things i'm running at a time. 

Also, I've been regularly updating my graphics driver, but it still crashes.

System specs: 
OS: Windows 10 Home 64 Bit
CPU: Intel Core i7 7700 @ 3.60GHz
RAM: 16GB Dual Channel @ 1502MHz
MoBo: AsusTek Prime Z270-AR
Graphics: 4095MB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti
Storage: 500GB Samsung SSD 960 Evo

Running two monitors, keyboard, mouse, headset, and Ethernet connection. 

Please help me figure this out. My game keeps crashing in the middle of ranked and making me lose. Thanks

replies.body: Unless there's a major hardware or driver issue, I've seen this happen because of the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) bar on Win10.  If you recently updated, make sure it's disabled then try again on a custom game.  Let me know if that helps.
I turned off the Xbox Game Bar, and I didnt have the issue for a few days. But then it happened again. It also happens sometimes when I'm playing other games like PUBG
